attributes.action: Continuously account for all public finances
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
All public income and spending - whether central government or local government etc. should be published continuously - as close to real time as is practical - with no loss of detail or completeness.
As we can assume that public spending is already controlled, accounted and computerised to the highest of standards - this should be straightforward and inexpensive to organise.
It is public money - it should by accounted for publicly. All of it.
